name: Cycling - the board game
description:
I love creating games, but if there is one thing i have learned over the past years, it is that it's incredible difficult to make something good. So please, leave me any feedback you have regarding the game. Did you have technical issues? Did you not understand the user interface? Of did you not enjoy certain parts of the game? Please let me know! I am more than happy to respond to your feedback and try to improve the game.

Join me! 

If you would like to join me in creating this or likeminded games, please get in touch! You can always send me an email at jaapk85@gmail.com.

Credits 

I have downloaded most of the artwork in the game, all credits are listed in the game itself.

Enjoy!
